question: Which of the following statements is true about Amazon CloudFront?

answers.A: It delivers the latest version of a file to the users.
answers.B: It will wait until the entire file downloads, so it can perform error checking before sending the file over to the user.
answers.C: It forwards a file to the user as soon as it receives the first bytes of the file.
answers.D: It waits for the user to request the file.
